text: Carl L. Garrett (August 31, 1947 â€“ August 24, 2020) was an American football halfback. He began his professional career with the American Football League's Boston Patriots. He also played for the Chicago Bears, New York Jets, and Oakland Raiders. His career began 1969 and he retired in 1977. Garrett was born in Denton, Texas. He studied at New Mexico Highlands University. Garrett died on August 24, 2020 in Denton at the age of 72.Denton native, former NFL running back Carl Garrett dies ==References== Category:1947 births Category:2020 deaths Category:New England Patriots players Category:Chicago Bears players Category:New York Jets players Category:Oakland Raiders players Category:Sportspeople from Texas Category:People from Denton, Texas
title: Carl Garrett
